title: Looking for someone to practice against
body:
Anyone intrested in 1 v 1'ing me regularly (at least once per day) please comment me and I'll add you as a friend! :D

P.s; the friendlier you are the better :)

replies.body: In what way? Full games, champs, hitting skillshots, dodging skillshots?

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IQufWXR0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-28T02:36:06.409+0000)
>
> In what way? Full games, champs, hitting skillshots, dodging skillshots?

I was thinking full games, and I will mostly play Jhin but I don't mind who the other person plays :)

> [{quoted}](name=Rohiki,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IQufWXR0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-28T02:51:08.958+0000)
>
> I was thinking full games, and I will mostly play Jhin but I don't mind who the other person plays :)

Once I get my account to 30, I can add you and duo with you as support. Even if it's normals. I can give you tips and such as we go.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IQufWXR0,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-28T05:12:05.917+0000)
>
> Once I get my account to 30, I can add you and duo with you as support. Even if it's normals. I can give you tips and such as we go.

Sounds awesome! I look forward to learning whatever you can teach me :)
